website_summaries.verdict: A resin with a good color range and reliable results in printing.
pros: Compatible with UV resin printers using DLP, laser, or LCD platforms
Works with a range of printer brands
Less odor than comparable resin liquids
cons: White color turns off-white like ivory or old plastic
Ink can separate from resin if left in the printer vat for several hours

customer_reviews.title: Depends on color...
customer_reviews.text: The clear is very strong, but yellowish. I would give the clear 5-stars though. The black is a little stronger than Anycubic black, but got sludgy at the bottom. The pigment settles even after shaking. The gray look awesome - great color, but is very hard to print (doesn't stick well even with long 80 second bottom-layers) and forms a sludge . Also rather weak - though that is not unusual for a gray. 2-stars. Use only if you love the shade of gray.
customer_reviews.author: Phönix

customer_reviews.title: Sparkmaker Settings
customer_reviews.text: Sparkmaker 85s first layer, 5mm supports, 7s/layer. All other at LCD-T standard settings. Prints faster, clearer than -T.
customer_reviews.author: SoloSailor

customer_reviews.title: worthless
customer_reviews.text: ok so I bought the black cause it was cheap but its worthless I used it in my anycubic photon and couldn't get anything it would print a few layers then just stick to the fep I've tried increasing and decreasing the exposier time I've re leveled multible times and its just nothing so I decided to put a little in the sunlight and it didn't start to cure till almost 20 seconds not sure if I got a bad batch or what the only thing I like about it is the metal container it comes in
customer_reviews.author: hidden

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I got myself a resin printer but didnt like the price of the resin they sold. So I decided to give with Monoprice resin because I believe they are a trusted brand. I didnt know if the resin would work properly with my printer but sure enough it did! It printed everything perfectly with all the detail I need. This resin is also good for if you want to paint your finished pieces with basic all purpose paint! Super happy and plan to buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Truehart

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Anycubic Photon. Making the exposer time a bit longer 12 to 13 seconds did the trick for me. Been printing with this resin for the last two days now without any problems. Love the price too. "White" is really off white. Reeeeeealy off white, almost yellow (kinda that yellow color old, white plastic turns after about 15 years). That's a bummer but no matter, painting it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: GrumpyButNice

customer_reviews.title: Black *barely* cures
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was just me... I thought there was something wrong with my printer... I thought maybe my settings were off, maybe it wasn't leveled... Maybe I needed to clean the film again... Is there something wrong with the platform? Nope - the "rapid" resin is just anything but rapid. This stuff's impossible. Even in direct sunlight it was taking nearly 30 seconds to cure.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Offermann

customer_reviews.title: MonoPrice Yellow Resin does not print
customer_reviews.text: I printed about 700ml of this resin and could not really get any good prints. I tried from 13 second to 30 second and none of it worked. I wasted about 150 hours on this stuff. At first I thought it was one bad bottle so i tried another. The other did not print right either. I decided to return and buy different resin and noe im getting good results.
customer_reviews.author: Lemin

customer_reviews.title: This will be my goto resin for red
customer_reviews.text: I really like this resin. It gives a great smooth texture, and has a nice reasonably fast cure time. If you pick models carefully, you can for some get away with no painting, or at least minimal paining to have an awesome looking final product.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lizotte

customer_reviews.title: WHITE easy to print with (5), but cures to light almond color (2)
customer_reviews.text: Lower viscosity than most, easy to print with and easy to clean up. But cures to a light almond almost "fleshy" color. Printed a 12 hour 7.2" x 4.5" x 5" XYZ job and it came out fine, and resin did not appear to separate much. Have the Kelant S400S, used exposures of bottom 60s, normal 8s
customer_reviews.author: BA

customer_reviews.title: Resin works great with SparkMaker printer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this resin to test on my SparkMaker printer and it works great with the low power UV source. I also enjoy the 250ml bottle size which limits how much resin is open and exposed to air and light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: We started with green resin and thought clear would be better. We have no issues with the clear and intend to use it but it's hard to notice some things before you prime, if you prime, your print. I would suggest unless you need it specifically just to get a colored resin instead as it'll be easier to see any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I liked the color. I couldn't get it to work on my Sparkmaker for the life of me i think i got 4 good prints out of it and thrown out over half a bottle on fails. Has me a little worried cause I have red as well I hope I don't have same problem. I am using clear right now and so far all prints successful with that color/non-color. I wrote this for the green, but I'm using it for the red as well. Red was just as disappointing sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Laser SLA - Nobel 1.0
customer_reviews.text: Works on my Laser SLA Nobel 1.0, 1st OEM settings failed 2nd print modified it was fine! Love it! I attached 1 photo but it is not letting me upload more .
customer_reviews.author: M. Goerke

customer_reviews.title: Pigment issues
customer_reviews.text: Tried to get this to work on my monoprice printer, the few prints that were complete had soft details and looked like they were melting. It seems the pigment made it too thick for the default print settings. You could up the rest time between exposures to allow more time for the excess to drain away, but your prints will take much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Yellow is garbage
customer_reviews.text: I spent an entire day trying to get it to stick to the build plate with no luck. I finally gave up and put gray in and it printed perfect. Don't buy it thinking you're getting a deal.
customer_reviews.author: L Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Useable resin on a budget.
customer_reviews.text: I like this resin. I've tried a number of other brands and this works just as well as any other . Though, when ordering this I thought I was going to be getting a little bit larger bottle. This is good for one 5 inch print and I used it on the nobel 1.0 3d printer. For the amount given. A $20 price tag would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Won’t work with Anycubic Photon using the black resin.
customer_reviews.text: Item did not work but could be because I was using it for the Anycubic Photon printer and not the Monoprice printer. In the past I’ve purchased from this vendor and all have worked with my Anycubic. This black resin however doesn’t work at all. Prints fall off mid print. Maybe the resin pigment is too dark for the Anycubic? Not sure but didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Smith

customer_reviews.title: Resin contained hard clumps...
customer_reviews.text: Given that hard clumps can crack a LCD screen I opted to return this resin after seeing that it was full of small clumps of what appeared to be cured resin.
customer_reviews.author: M H

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Canister
customer_reviews.text: The plastic cap you are to you to secure and shake up the resin LEAKS. The can I received was dented but that was likely due to it being made of metal. The print quality was on par with what I came to expect from my Elegoo Mars. But unless I see they redesign the bottle to be more secure I will not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Howard B. Gusoff

customer_reviews.title: globby
customer_reviews.text: It cures through layers, The center of my part was solid to the build plate when there should have been about 8mm of support. I'm mixing it with black and it works much better however it doesn't stick to the build plate very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: worst resin i have ever used
customer_reviews.text: print after print failed i switched back to my original resin and perfect prints but this resin is just terrible
customer_reviews.author: cube60659

customer_reviews.title: Works in Elegoo Mars
customer_reviews.text: I read some of the remarks about it not adhering but I did a 90 Sec base and a 10 sec exposure and it worked without any issue.
customer_reviews.author: stumpy

customer_reviews.title: need to tweak settings
customer_reviews.text: I couldn never get a print to hold with this stuff, may have to try and increase the timing on the UV light to cure longer
customer_reviews.author: kellyrx8

customer_reviews.title: Do not use in sparkmaker 3d printer!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt work in Sparkmaker!!!! The grey color no matter what would cure the entire bottom as one sheet of cured resin. Switched to elegoo resin and have had amazing results.
customer_reviews.author: Buck32

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from yellow
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it zero stars if possible. I ordered a bottle of yellow. Every print failed. Increase exposure up to 60 seconds per layer at .05 mm layer height on a Monoprice SLA Deluxe. Prior to this, I've had about a 90% success rate on over 200 individual prints with 3 other uv resins. I ordered the 1000ml Gray and that one performed alright.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew G.

customer_reviews.title: Delivers good, yellow prints
customer_reviews.text: The prints look nice but the coloring is very yellow. I needed them to really be clear so I bought another brand and use this for the stuff we'll paint over.
customer_reviews.author: M. wells

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Can get this resin to print right with the photon.
customer_reviews.author: josie

customer_reviews.title: There’s better quality out there
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality resin, the pigment separates during long prints causing failures
customer_reviews.author: L Gulotta

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: Tried every different setting you could imagine because I had 4 bottles and I couldn't return them. I've printed 1000's of parts, so I know what I'm doing. Bought another brand and no more problems. Save yourself the trouble, buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Great! Just use longer Exposure time
customer_reviews.text: I like it! It looks great but it does take longer exposure time. On my second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Speedy

customer_reviews.title: Failure in a bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Half a dozen attempts to print with this and all failed. No issues with 3 previous resins and one after. Different settings and no improvement. Horrible to clean up to boot. I cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Cox

customer_reviews.title: RED
customer_reviews.text: IDK if I got a bad a batch or what, but not only is this pretty finicky as far as curing goes, it is RED with a #verysmol amount of orange. I may try it again in the future, but im sticking with the Elegoo brand.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Miller

customer_reviews.title: Color separates
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of color separating and part of my print were clear. I did shake it before use. I have not had this issue with other resins
customer_reviews.author: nate

customer_reviews.title: Works very well, but has a yellowish tint to it.
customer_reviews.text: Not crystal clear, but it works and it stuck to the build plate.
customer_reviews.author: ThorMJ

customer_reviews.title: Glad it wasn't very expensive because it wasn't worth much
customer_reviews.text: I got the rapid black because it was cheap, I have tried every configuration I could think of amd nothing worked. It may be different for the other rapid resins they offer, but the black is a bust
customer_reviews.author: billydoom

customer_reviews.title: Prints
customer_reviews.text: +Print quality - clear but with a lite yellow/green hint
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Leonard

customer_reviews.title: don’t use with anycubic photon
customer_reviews.text: don’t waste your money to use this with anycubic photon. pealing of build plate every time. no matter the settings.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good low toxic resin for printing on the AnyCubic Photon
customer_reviews.text: Had to double the exposure times (black resin), but it printed well with fine detail and little of the fumes of other resins. Easier to clean also.
customer_reviews.author: Fahren C.

customer_reviews.title: Works really well in the Anycubic Photon
customer_reviews.text: One of the best UV resins I have tried. Great price. Remember, SHAKE YOUR RESIN before use.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Rasberry

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is awful. Smells really bad and wouldn't bond to print surface.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great black resin
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had great experiences with monoprice and this is the swme
customer_reviews.author: Matthew fisher

customer_reviews.title: Better to purchase different brand.
customer_reviews.text: I've had three bottles from this brand and its only 2 3rds full of resin.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Ellis

customer_reviews.title: useless
customer_reviews.text: didnt work with my elegoo mars didnt stick to the plataform
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo G.

customer_reviews.title: This will not work in my printer but it is ...
customer_reviews.text: This will not work in my printer but it is too late to return it. I guess it will get thrown out.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M.

customer_reviews.title: Good, less (but still present) smell than Anycubic resin.
customer_reviews.text: Works well with the anycubic photon and has less of a smell than the included resin. The smell is still mildly present, but not nearly as bad. However, I wouldn’t call this “clear” - the rabbit demo-print is a pretty accurate color of it, which is an off-white.
customer_reviews.author: Yes

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to use in a well ventilated area.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Kind of ends up yellow, or cream after curing in the UV oven. I use a Sparkmaker, and it works perfectly. 8 prints so far, and not even half a bottle used. This stuff goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Frawgenstein

product_meta.title: Monoprice Rapid UV 3D Printer Resin 250ml - Black | Compatible With All UV Resin Printers DLP, Laser, or LCD
product_meta.description: Size:250ml| Color:BlackLow cost – low fumes – safe for home use delivering ultra high accuracy and low shrinkage. MP rapid UV resin provides value and consistency in your work. High quality pigments provide stunning colors in our range of resins and available colors (black, white, Gray, clear, yellow, red, green, and orange). compatible with all UV resin printers (dlp, laser, or LCD), the formula has been optimized for low power LCD resin printers. Cures at 405nm wavelength.
feature_bullets: Compatible with all UV resin printers (DLP, Laser, or LCD), the formula has been optimized for low power LCD resin printers
Low Cost/Low Fumes: Safe for home use delivering ultra high accuracy and low shrinkage
MP RapidUV resin provides value and consistency in your work
Quality at a Fair Price: Monoprice's rugged design and rigid quality control standards deliver high quality products at fair prices
Service & Support : You're never on your own with Monoprice products! We have a full team of friendly and knowledgeable technicians available to answer your questions, both before and after the sale

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
